goal.en: 1. Provide basic knowledge for understanding the optical phenomena in crystals 2. Learn how to apply the knowledge of crystal optics in related research works
goal.ch: 1. 學習基礎的物理知識以瞭解晶體中發生的光學現象 2. 學習如何將晶體光學的知識應用於研究中

content.en:
1. Electromagnetic fields and waves
2. Polarization states of light waves
3. Propagation of electromagnetic waves in anisotropic media
4. Wave retardation plates and filters
5. Controling the electromagnetic propagation properties in anisotropic media by appling external electric field
content.ch:
1. 電磁場與電磁波
2. 光之偏振狀態
3. 光在各向異性物質中的傳播特性
4. 波片與濾波器
5.藉外加電場調控各向異性物質的光傳播特性

textbook.en: “Optical Waves in Crystals“ by Amnon Yariv ＆ Pochi Yeh
textbook.ch: “Optical Waves in Crystals“ by Amnon Yariv ＆ Pochi Yeh
